name: Sift Dev
headline: Your Logs, Finally Free
description: We're an intelligent pipeline for your logs. Reduce your logging volume and take back control in just a few clicks.

# Set Up Log Management in Minutes
We handle setup, management, and let you switch vendors anytime. Never worry about choosing the wrong logging platform.
Watch DemoGet Started Free
## Why Startups Choose Sift
We've reimagined log management to solve the real problems startups face
### Zero Setup Headache
We Do The Work
Send us your logs, we handle everything else. No need to research Datadog vs Splunk vs other vendors. Most startups are up and running in under 10 minutes.
![Zero Setup Headache](https://www.yc.trysift.dev/assets/1step-setup-YXddP8jM.png)
### Future-Proof Your Choice
Switch Vendors Anytime
Start with any vendor. As your needs change, switch with one click. No migration headaches, no vendor lock-in. Your future self will thank you.
![Future-Proof Your Choice](https://www.yc.trysift.dev/assets/multi-destinations-BAm21uHA.png)
### Cheaper While You Scale
Focus on Building
Free for typical startup usage. Plus, we save you money when you hit enterprise-level scale. It's a win-win.
![Cheaper While You Scale](https://www.yc.trysift.dev/assets/reduction-CvLSjnRd.jpeg)
## See How It Works
Watch us set up a pipeline and use AI to optimize it
Your browser does not support the video tag.
## Why Log Management Matters
Every growing startup needs log management to debug issues and monitor performance. This unlocks your ability to scale. But choosing and setting up the right platform takes precious time away from building your product.
Debug Faster
Quickly identify and fix issues in production
Monitor Growth
Track performance as you scale your startup
Save Time
Focus on your product, not infrastructure
## Ready to simplify your log management?
Try DemoGet Started Free

generated_description:
**Sift Dev: Your Logs, Finally Free**

Founded in 2024 as part of Y Combinator Batch W25, Sift Dev is on a mission to simplify how startups handle log management. Hailing from San Francisco with a lean team of just two, Sift Dev provides an intelligent logging pipeline that reduces volume and allows users to regain control with minimal setup effort. 

Their pitch? "Zero Setup Headache." They promise that startups can send their logs and Sift Dev will take care of the rest, eliminating the cumbersome process of evaluating various logging platforms like Datadog and Splunk. Most new users can get up and running in under ten minutes, freeing them up to focus on what truly matters: building their product. This ease of use is a significant draw, especially for founders who need to move quickly.

Another crucial feature is the ability to switch vendors with ease. As your needs evolve, Sift Dev enables you to switch logging vendors in just one click—no strings attached. This "future-proof" model reassures companies that they won't get trapped in a system that doesn't grow with them.

In terms of cost, Sift Dev understands the startup mentality. Their service is free for typical usage, and they promise savings as users scale up to enterprise levels. This dual approach, making things cheaper while promoting growth, is essentially a win-win.

For any growing startup, robust log management is pivotal for debugging and performance tracking. Sift Dev addresses these needs thoughtfully, allowing companies to monitor their growth without getting bogged down by the technical complexities often associated with log management.

Ready to take control of your logs? Sift Dev is here to make it straightforward. You can explore their offerings and even watch a demo on their website: [Sift Dev](https://www.yc.trysift.dev/). 

In summary, Sift Dev is a fresh contender in the developer tools space, poised to streamline log management through intelligent, user-friendly solutions that cater specifically to startup needs. It's the kind of innovation that not only saves time but empowers founders to focus where it truly counts—on their product.
